sectionIDescription: Brief overview of the process of preparation of the report
preparationProcess: Please briefly describe the process undertaken for the preparation of this report (responses may include the following)
coordination: Coordination mechanisms and methodology for data collection and validation employed (if applicable) as well as key challenges encountered;
consultation: Consultations undertaken at various levels for preparing this report, involving and engaging various stakeholders, taking into account national circumstances.
sectionMandatory: All fields in Section I are mandatory
